Crono.name: Cyclone
Crono.description: Whirl about enemy, striking others nearby.

Crono.name: Wind Slash
Crono.description: Hit all enemies in a line with a wave of wind.

Crono.name: Cleave (Spincut)
Crono.description: Deal double damage to one enemy.

Crono.name: Raise (Life)
Crono.description: Revive a KO'd ally (restore them to life).

Crono.name: Frenzy (Confuse)
Crono.description: Strike one enemy 4 times in succession.

Crono.name: Luminaire
Crono.description: Attack all enemies with holy light.

Marle.name: Aura
Marle.description: Restore a small amount of HP to one ally.

Marle.name: Cure
Marle.description: Restore a moderate amount of HP to one ally.

Marle.name: Haste
Marle.description: Halve the waiting time between that ally's turns.

Marle.name: Cure II
Marle.description: Greatly restore HP to one ally.

Marle.name: Arise (Life2)
Marle.description: Revive a fallen ally and fully heal them.

Lucca.name: Flamethrower (Flame Toss)
Lucca.description: Burn enemies along a direct line in front.

Lucca.name: Napalm (Napalm Bomb)
Lucca.description: Bomb enemies within a circle (area effect).

Lucca.name: Protect
Lucca.description: Boost one ally's Defense (physical defense up).

Lucca.name: Megaton Bomb (Mega Bomb)
Lucca.description: Blast enemies in a circle with a huge explosion.

Lucca.name: Flare
Lucca.description: Attack all enemies with an intense fire attack.

Frog.name: Slurp
Frog.description: Restore a small amount of HP to one ally (using Frog's tongue).

Frog.name: Slurp Slash (Slurp Cut)
Frog.description: Pull an enemy with tongue and then slash it.

Frog.name: Water
Frog.description: Attack an enemy with a water spell.

Frog.name: Heal
Frog.description: Restore a moderate amount of HP to all allies.

Frog.name: Aerial Strike (Leap Slash)
Frog.description: Leap into the air and dive onto one enemy with a sword strike.

Frog.name: Water II
Frog.description: Attack all enemies with a powerful water spell.

Frog.name: Cure II
Frog.description: Greatly restore HP to one ally (same effect as Marle's Cure II).

Frog.name: Frog Squash
Frog.description: Hit all enemies -- damage increases dramatically when Frog's HP is low.

Robo.name: Rocket Punch
Robo.description: Launch Robo's fist at one enemy to deal damage.

Robo.name: Cure Beam
Robo.description: Restore a small amount of HP to one ally (Robo's heal beam).

Robo.name: Laser Spin
Robo.description: Attack all enemies with a 360° laser spin (Shadow elemental).

Robo.name: Robo Tackle
Robo.description: Charge and tackle one enemy, dealing physical damage.

Robo.name: Heal Beam
Robo.description: Restore a small amount of HP to all allies (party-wide heal).

Robo.name: Rapid-fire Fist (Uzzi Punch)
Robo.description: Barrage one enemy with a series of rocket punches.

Robo.name: Proximity Bomb (Area Bomb)
Robo.description: Blast all enemies near Robo with a fiery explosion.

Robo.name: Electrocute (Shock)
Robo.description: Zap all enemies with a powerful electrical surge.

Ayla.name: Kiss
Ayla.description: Lightly heal one ally and cure their status ailments.

Ayla.name: Roundillo Kick (Rollo Kick)
Ayla.description: Perform a jumping roll-kick on one enemy.

Ayla.name: Cat Attack
Ayla.description: Savage an enemy with a claw and bite combo.

Ayla.name: Boulder Toss (Rock Throw)
Ayla.description: Grab and throw a single enemy into the air like a boulder.

Ayla.name: Charm
Ayla.description: Seduce an enemy to steal an item from it.

Ayla.name: Tail Spin
Ayla.description: Spin into nearby enemies with Ayla's tail, hitting all around her.

Ayla.name: Dino Tail
Ayla.description: Hit all foes with a massive tail attack - more damage when Ayla's HP is low.

Ayla.name: Triple Kick
Ayla.description: Deliver a combo of 3 powerful kicks to one enemy.

Magus.name: Lightning II
Magus.description: Attack all enemies with a lightning spell.

Magus.name: Ice II
Magus.description: Attack all enemies with an ice spell.

Magus.name: Fire II
Magus.description: Attack all enemies with a fire spell.

Magus.name: Dark Bomb
Magus.description: Detonate a dark bomb that hits enemies in a radius.

Magus.name: Barrier (Magic Wall)
Magus.description: Boost one ally's Magic Defense (magical barrier up).

Magus.name: Dark Mist
Magus.description: Attack all enemies with a cloud of darkness.

Magus.name: Black Hole
Magus.description: Attempt to suck in and instantly kill enemies in a small area (may fail on strong foes).

Magus.name: Dark Matter
Magus.description: Unleash the ultimate darkness spell on all enemies.

doubleTechs.name: Aura Whirl
doubleTechs.description: Restore a small amount of HP to all allies.

doubleTechs.name: Ice Sword
doubleTechs.description: Strike a foe with an ice-enchanted blade (Crono attacks with Ice element).

doubleTechs.name: Ice Sword II
doubleTechs.description: Hit all foes in a circle with a powerful ice sword attack.

doubleTechs.name: Fire Whirl
doubleTechs.description: Attack all enemies in a circle with a spinning fire attack.

doubleTechs.name: Fire Sword
doubleTechs.description: Strike a foe with a fire-enchanted blade (Crono attacks with Fire element).

doubleTechs.name: Fire Sword II
doubleTechs.description: Hit all foes in a circle with a powerful fire sword attack.

doubleTechs.name: Supersonic Spin (Rocket Roll)
doubleTechs.description: Attack all enemies with a combination of spin attacks and lasers (Shadow damage).

doubleTechs.name: Cyclone Sweep (Max Cyclone)
doubleTechs.description: Robo picks up Crono and spins him, slashing enemies near Robo.

doubleTechs.name: Megavolt (Super Volt)
doubleTechs.description: Blast all enemies with a massive electrical discharge (Light damage).

doubleTechs.name: X-Strike
doubleTechs.description: Crono and Frog cross-slash a single enemy in an X formation.

doubleTechs.name: Sword Stream (Spire)
doubleTechs.description: Shower an enemy with a stream of water as Frog strikes (Water-element blade).

doubleTechs.name: Lightning Rod (Spire)
doubleTechs.description: Frog impales an enemy with his sword and Crono strikes it with lightning (Light damage).

doubleTechs.name: Drill Kick
doubleTechs.description: Crono launches Ayla in a drilling kick attack at one enemy.

doubleTechs.name: Thunder Chomp (Volt Bite)
doubleTechs.description: Ayla bites an enemy charged with Crono's lightning for heavy Light damage.

doubleTechs.name: Falcon Strike (Falcon Hit)
doubleTechs.description: Crono and Ayla dash in a line, hitting all enemies along a horizontal line.

doubleTechs.name: Antipode Bomb (Antipode)
doubleTechs.description: Combine fire and ice to explode on enemies in a radius (Shadow damage).

doubleTechs.name: Antipode Bomb II (Antipode 2)
doubleTechs.description: Stronger version of Antipode: fire and ice blast enemies in a radius (Shadow).

doubleTechs.name: Antipode Bomb III (Antipode 3)
doubleTechs.description: The ultimate Antipode: engulf all enemies in massive fire and ice (Shadow).

doubleTechs.name: Aura Beam
doubleTechs.description: Heal all allies for a small amount of HP (combining Marle's and Robo's healing).

doubleTechs.name: Ice Tackle
doubleTechs.description: Robo tackles an enemy imbued with ice, dealing Ice-element physical damage.

doubleTechs.name: Cure Wind (Cure Touch)
doubleTechs.description: Greatly restore HP to all allies (combined advanced healing tech).

doubleTechs.name: Ice Water
doubleTechs.description: Drench all enemies in an icy shower (combines Marle's Ice and Frog's Water).

doubleTechs.name: Glacial Freeze (Glacier)
doubleTechs.description: Impale one enemy with colossal icicles (powerful Ice/Water attack).

doubleTechs.name: Double Cure
doubleTechs.description: Fully restore HP to all allies and remove negative status effects.

doubleTechs.name: Twin Charm
doubleTechs.description: Marle and Ayla team up to greatly increase the success of stealing an item from an enemy.

doubleTechs.name: Ice Toss
doubleTechs.description: Ayla throws a huge ice chunk (created by Marle) onto enemies in a radius.

doubleTechs.name: Iceberg Toss (Cube Toss)
doubleTechs.description: Drop a massive iceberg on enemies in an area (very powerful Ice attack).

doubleTechs.name: Fire Punch
doubleTechs.description: Robo punches through enemies with a fist ignited by Lucca's fire (Fire damage in area).

doubleTechs.name: Fire Tackle
doubleTechs.description: Robo tackles an enemy while engulfed in flames (Fire damage to one).

doubleTechs.name: Double Bomb
doubleTechs.description: Lucca and Robo drop explosives, blasting all enemies around Robo (Fire damage).

doubleTechs.name: Flame Kick
doubleTechs.description: Ayla performs a fiery kick on one enemy after Lucca ignites her foot (Fire damage).

doubleTechs.name: Inferno (Fire Whirl*)
doubleTechs.description: Ayla creates a whirling flame with Lucca's help, hitting all enemies (Fire elemental).

doubleTechs.name: Blaze Kick
doubleTechs.description: Ayla delivers a series of three fiery kicks to one enemy (Fire damage).

doubleTechs.name: Frog Launcher (Blade Toss)
doubleTechs.description: Robo launches Frog like a projectile, striking enemies in a horizontal line.

doubleTechs.name: Bubble Breath (Bubble Snap)
doubleTechs.description: Frog inflates Robo like a balloon and drops him on an enemy (physical damage).

doubleTechs.name: Cure Wave
doubleTechs.description: Greatly heal all allies by combining Frog's and Robo's healing energies.

doubleTechs.name: Boogie
doubleTechs.description: Inflict Stop status on all enemies by performing a strange dance.

doubleTechs.name: Spin Kick
doubleTechs.description: Robo throws Ayla in a spinning kick that strikes one enemy.

doubleTechs.name: Beast Toss
doubleTechs.description: Robo and Ayla team up to grab a monster and hurl it away, dealing big damage.

doubleTechs.name: Slurp Kiss
doubleTechs.description: Heal all allies and cure status by combining Frog's Slurp and Ayla's Kiss.

doubleTechs.name: Bubble Burst (Bubble Hit)
doubleTechs.description: Ayla drops onto an enemy from above while Frog cushions the impact with a water bubble.

doubleTechs.name: Dropdown (Drop Kick)
doubleTechs.description: Frog and Ayla perform a devastating drop attack from above on one enemy.

doubleTechs.name: Red Needle (Red Pin)
doubleTechs.description: Frog leaps and impales an enemy with a fire-imbued strike (Fire damage).

doubleTechs.name: Line Bomb
doubleTechs.description: Lucca drops a bomb that Frog bats in a straight line, hitting all enemies in its path.

doubleTechs.name: Frog Flare
doubleTechs.description: Combine Frog's ultimate physical and Lucca's ultimate magic: massive damage to all enemies (Fire + physical, can exceed normal damage cap).

tripleTechs.name: Delta Force
tripleTechs.description: Crono, Marle y Lucca combinan luz, hielo y fuego para golpear a todos los enemigos con una gran explosión elemental (daño tipo "Shadow" resultante).

tripleTechs.name: Lifeline
tripleTechs.description: Aplica a todo el equipo un estado de auto-revivir una vez (si un aliado cae en combate, será resucitado automáticamente una vez).

tripleTechs.name: Frost Arc (Arc Impulse)
tripleTechs.description: Crono y Frog atacan a un enemigo con un golpe de espada combinado, potenciado por el hielo de Marle (gran daño elemental de hielo a un objetivo).

tripleTechs.name: Final Kick
tripleTechs.description: Marle congela a un enemigo, Ayla le da una poderosa patada y Crono lo electrocuta, todo en un combo devastador en un solo enemigo.

tripleTechs.name: Ring of Fire (Fire Zone)
tripleTechs.description: Robo toma a Crono, y junto con la magia de fuego de Lucca, giran atravesando a los enemigos cercanos con un aro de fuego (daño de Fuego en área alrededor de Robo).

tripleTechs.name: Delta Storm
tripleTechs.description: Igual que Delta Force pero con Frog en lugar de Marle: combina Rayo + Fuego + Agua para atacar a todos los enemigos con daño de sombra.

tripleTechs.name: Gatling Kick
tripleTechs.description: Ayla realiza un combo de patadas veloces imbuido con el poder del rayo de Crono y el fuego de Lucca, enfocado en un solo enemigo (daño Shadow combinado).

tripleTechs.name: Triple Attack (Triple Raid)
tripleTechs.description: Crono, Frog y Robo atacan juntos a un enemigo desde tres direcciones, infligiendo un gran daño físico concentrado.

tripleTechs.name: Twister
tripleTechs.description: Genera un enorme tornado (combinando viento, láser y fuerza física) que golpea a todos los enemigos con daño de sombra.

tripleTechs.name: 3-D Attack (3D Attack)
tripleTechs.description: Ataque triple donde Crono, Frog y Ayla golpean simultáneamente a un enemigo desde distintas posiciones (ataque físico muy potente a un objetivo).

tripleTechs.name: Eternal Darkness (Dark Eternal)
tripleTechs.description: Magus, Marle y Lucca combinan sus poderes para invocar una oscuridad absoluta que daña a todos los enemigos (requiere equipar el ítem especial "Black Gemstone").

tripleTechs.name: Omega Flare
tripleTechs.description: Combina el láser de Robo amplificado por Flare de Lucca y magia oscura de Magus para disparar un rayo devastador a todos los enemigos (requiere equipar "Blue Gemstone").

tripleTechs.name: Spin Strike
tripleTechs.description: Ataque triple donde Frog y Robo impulsan a Ayla en un salto giratorio que golpea violentamente a un enemigo (requiere equipar "Silver Gemstone").

tripleTechs.name: Poyozo Dance
tripleTechs.description: Las chicas realizan un baile extraño que confunde a todos los enemigos y provoca daño mágico desconocido (requiere equipar "White Gemstone").

tripleTechs.name: Master Mune (Grand Dream)
tripleTechs.description: Invoca a Masa y Mune (espíritus de la espada Masamune) para golpear a todos los enemigos con una poderosa energía, combinando el poder de Frog, Robo y Marle (requiere equipar "Golden Gemstone").
